summary: This is a brief email from an unidentified sender to Lill Ann Sanchez, forwarding a response to a letter she had sent to an unspecified recipient. The email includes an attachment named '071009 Sanchez_Ltr.pdf'.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 9, 2007, sent to Lill Ann Sanchez.
The email forwards a response to a letter that Sanchez had sent to an unspecified recipient.
The attached file is named '071009 Sanchez_Ltr.pdf', suggesting it is the formal response letter.
